member.name: IMediaRendererFactory.CreateMediaRendererAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously creates a new instance of an object that implements the IMediaRenderer interface using the specified Unique Device Name (UDN).
member.param: An HSTRING containing a UDN that identifies the DLNA DMR device for which an instance of IMediaRenderer will be created.
Receives a reference to a CreateMediaRendererOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRendererFactory.CreateMediaRendererFromBasicDeviceAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously creates a new instance of an object that implements the IMediaRenderer interface using the specified IBasicDevice interface.
member.param: A pointer to an IBasicDevice interface representing the device for which an instance of IMediaRenderer will be created.
Receives a reference to a CreateMediaRendererOperation object that is used to get results from the asynchronous operation.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMediaRendererFactory
member.summary: Encapsulates the methods needed to asynchronously create a new instance of an object that implements the IMediaRenderer interface.
